text: Wechat privacy policy
Last update time: 2022-03-22
Overview
Thank you for using WeChat!
We respect your attention to privacy and thank you for your trust and confidence in us.
The following is an information summary contained in the information summary ("Privacy Policy") contained in this privacy policy.
This abstract is to help you grasp the main points of privacy policies. Reading this Abstract does not mean that the full text of this policy has been read!
You can use the following hyperlinks to jump directly to the specific chapters in privacy policies.
Is this privacy policy applied to you?

If you are a weChat user, that is, you have registered with the mobile phone number ("Non -Chinese mobile phone number") by binding the international dial -up code other than +86, and this privacy policy is applicable to you.
This privacy policy is not suitable for WeChat users.
In the following cases, you are WeChat users:
Register by binding the use of international dial -up code +86 ("Mainland China Mobile Number") for registration;
or
Signing with WeChat with Shenzhenzhen TENCENT Computer Systems Company Limited.
If you are a WeChat user, you need to abide by the Tencent WeChat Software License and Service Agreement and the Guidelines for WeChat Privacy Protection, not this privacy policy.
You can also click "I"> "Settings"> "About", and then click the "Service Agreement" link to view whether you are wechat users or WeChat users.
If you see "WeChat Service Agreement", it means you are a WeChat user.
If you see the Tencent WeChat Software License and Service Agreement, you are a WeChat user.

If you later replaced the phone number (replaced from the mobile phone number from mainland China to the non -China mainland mobile phone number, or otherwise), you will need to switch your account (according to your new phone number, switch to a WeChat account or WeChat account).
If you switch from a WeChat account to a wechat account, this privacy policy will be applied to you from the date when we systematically record the switch.
If you switch from WeChat account to WeChat account, this privacy policy will no longer apply from our system records that the switching.
What information do you need to WeChat?
When registering, wechat, account, we will need your mobile phone number and nickname.

First Party Collection Information

text: More information
How do we use your information?

We will use your information to you, wechat, allow you to communicate with other users, so that you can use, wechat, the features provided above, and the improvement and support you, wechat, experience.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will use your information to provide you with a WeChat, allowing you to communicate with other users, so that you can use the functions provided by WeChat, and improve and support your wechat experience.

text: If you are your child's parents or guardian and have allowed them to use it, wechat will keep the contact information you provide to ensure that we may verify any request or question made by your child, wechat, account.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you are a child's parent or guardian and have allowed them to use WeChat, we will keep the contact information you provide.

text: More information
Who should we share your data with?

Unless you need to provide services (such as SMS, location, and map service providers), or in accordance with the instructions of the court, relevant departments or legal provisions, we will not share your information with a third party.
We use these third -party services to process or store your information only for the purpose described in this privacy policy.
Any third party that shared user data must provide the same or the same user data protection as described in the privacy policy.
More information
Where do we process your data?
The following is an information abstract ("Hong Kong Special Economic Zone") contained in this privacy policy.

We also have support, engineering and other teams. These teams support WeChat to users around the world (including Singapore and the Netherlands), and they will have the right to access your information.
We have adopted strict internal control measures to access your data for only designated personnel.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We have adopted strict internal control measures to access your data for only designated personnel.

text: More information
How long will we keep your information?
The time we retain your information depends on the type of information. For example, the login data is retained at most from the date of collecting data, 90, day.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The time we retain your information depends on the type of information.

text: We keep your information more than the deadline prescribed by the law.
label: Data Retention
Important
Data Security
rewrite: We keep your information more than the deadline prescribed by the law.

text: More information
How do I exercise their rights on my data?
According to your place of residence, you may have special rights to your data and our way.
These include how to access data, delete data, use the method of restricting data, refuse to use data, and obtain your information copy.
More information
Appendix of specific jurisdictions

If you are a user in the following countries/regions: Australia, Brazil, California, Canada, Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, India, Indonesia, Japan, Macau Special Administrative Region, Malaysia, Mexico, the Philippines, Russia, Serbia, Singapore, South Korea, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, China, Thailand, Turkey, the United Arab Emirates, Britain or Vietnam, there are additional clauses for your specific jurisdictions.
You can access this page to view these additional clauses.
How do we notify you to change?
If there are any major changes in this privacy policy, we will update here and notify you before changing the effect.
More information
Data controller

If you are located in the European Economic Zone ("EEA"), the United Kingdom of Britain and the Northern Ireland ("British"), or a WeChat user in Switzerland, the data controller is: Tencent International Service EUROPE B.V., a Dutch company, the address is BuitenveldeRTELAAN 1-5, 1082 VA, Amsterdam, The Netherlands;

If you are a WeChat user located in EEA, Britain, Switzerland, or outside China, the data controller is: WeChat International Pte. LTD., a Singapore company, the address is 10 Anson Road, #21-07 International Plaza, Singapore 079903.
contact us

If you have any questions or complaints about the use of privacy policies or your personal information, please send an email, dataprotection@wechat.com, or write a letter, Buitenveldertselaan, 1-5, 1082, VA, Amsterdam,The, netherlands (recipient: data protection officer of the Ministry of Justice), contact our data protection officer.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Email: DataProtection@wechat.com; Mailing Address: Buitenvelderedeelaan 1-5, 1082 VA, Amsterdam, The Netherlands

text: Please note that if you are a resident of EEA, Britain or Switzerland, you have the right to complain to your country's data protection agencies.

If you have a privacy or data use problem that has not been resolved, but we are not able to deal with it satisfactorily, please contact our third-party dispute solution to the provider (free) through the following ways: https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request.
Operation with WeChat
WeChat can operate with WeChat, so you can communicate with WeChat users to view each other's circle of friends and status posts.
According to the applicable terms, you can also use some functions running on WeChat.
You can view the function list of WeChat running here.

When you interact with WeChat users, or use or receive any of any functions running from WeChat (collectively referred to as "interactive interaction"), we will share your information with WeChat within the necessary range to promote you to promote youCarry out interoperability.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: When you interact with WeChat users, or use or receive notifications from WeChat, we will share your information with WeChat within the necessary range.

text: You should also abide by the "WeChat Privacy Protection Guide".
